titles.title: Open The Eyes Of My Heart, Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Open the eyes of my heart, Lord Open the eyes of my heart I want to see You I want to see You (repeat){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}To see You high and lifted up Shining in the light of Your glory Pour out Your power and love As we sing holy, holy, holy.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Holy, holy, holy Holy, holy, holy Holy, holy, holy I want to see You{/lang-eng}
